p: Vitamin C was determined using ultraviolet-HPLC methods[ 19] and then measured absorbance at 245 nm. Vitamin B1 and Vitamin B2 were determined by fluorometric method according to the AOAC 942.23 and 970.65, 2016,[ 17] respectively, and then measured emission at 365 nm and excitation at 435 nm. Calcium and sodium were determined by atomic absorption spectrophotometer (AAS) (AOAC 985.35, 2016),[ 17] dried leaf samples at 450Â°C then measured AAS absorbance at 425 and 590 nm, respectively. Iron was determined by AAS (AOAC 984.27, 2016)[ 17] and then measured absorbance at 250 nm.
